mapper.select: SELECT cr.class_registration_no, cr.lecture_no, cr.account_id, cr.class_registration_state, cr.class_registration_point, cr.class_registration_review, cr.class_registration_createdate, lc.lecture_no, lc.account_id, lc.subject_no, lc.teacher_name, lc.lecture_name, lc.textbook_isbn, lc.lecture_startdate, lc.lecture_enddate, lc.lecture_total, lc.syllabus_no, lc.classroom_no, lc.lecture_createdate, lc.lecture_updatedate, sj.subject_no, sj.subject_name, sj.subject_createdate, sj.subject_updatedate, sj.subject_totalday, sj.subject_info FROM class_registration cr LEFT JOIN lecture lc ON cr.lecture_no = lc.lecture_no LEFT JOIN subject sj ON lc.subject_no = sj.subject_no WHERE cr.class_registration_no=#{classRegistration}

SELECT lecture_no lectureNo, account_id accountId, class_registration_state classRegistrationState, class_registration_point classRegistrationPoint, class_registration_review classRegistrationReview, class_registration_createdate classRegistrationCreateDate FROM class_registration WHERE account_id=#{accountId} ORDER BY class_registration_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM class_registration WHERE account_id=#{accountId}

SELECT cr.class_registration_no, cr.lecture_no, cr.account_id, cr.class_registration_state, cr.class_registration_point, cr.class_registration_review, cr.class_registration_createdate, lc.lecture_no, lc.account_id, lc.subject_no, lc.teacher_name, lc.lecture_name, lc.textbook_isbn, lc.lecture_startdate, lc.lecture_enddate, lc.lecture_total, lc.syllabus_no, lc.classroom_no, lc.lecture_createdate, lc.lecture_updatedate, sj.subject_no, sj.subject_name, sj.subject_createdate, sj.subject_updatedate, sj.subject_totalday, sj.subject_info FROM class_registration cr LEFT JOIN lecture lc ON cr.lecture_no = lc.lecture_no LEFT JOIN subject sj ON lc.subject_no = sj.subject_no WHERE cr.class_registration_no=#{classRegistrationNo} LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM class_registration WHERE lecture_no=#{lectureNo}
